argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsmub1.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_lsmub1 | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> T C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_lsmub2 | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> U C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_unssd | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( T u. U ) C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) |
